title: Lemon Soufflé Cheesecake with Blueberry Compote
ingredients: ['Base', '125g (4¼ oz) digestive biscuit crumbs', '2 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon butter, melted', 'Cheesecake', '900g (2 lb) cream cheese, softened', '200g (7 oz) caster sugar', '4 large egg yolks', '1 tablespoon finely grated lemon zest', '4 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '125ml (4¼ fl oz) soured cream', '4 large egg whites', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', 'Compote', '500g (1¼ lb) fresh or frozen blueberries, thawed', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice']
